column2: There have been signs of a storm brewing from the Fire Nation. Sources say that there has been an unprecedented military buildup within the Fire Nation as well as a shift towards military manufacturing. A large draft has been put in place by the Firelord drafting an entire generation into the ranks of the army in preparation for something large.
This is a great failure for us...
Such weaklings think this will matter?
It is of no concern to us

Change is happening within the glorious Fire Nation. Through the work of our glorious Firelord, we have experienced unprecedented growth and prosperity. Our economy has flourished, and the brightest minds of the Fire Nation have churned spectacular invention after invention. There is no question that our glorious nation triumphs over the other nations. With all this prosperity, it is our duty to spread it beyond our borders.
